name: Pin City
description:
Pin City is a VR 2D platformer/puzzle game. Collect the pins in VR and collect the pins in real life! Created at VR Austin VR Jam 2017 (Nov 11-12) by 2 people. This is an early prototype/proof of concept for Pin City. Designed for HTC Vive. Headset and motion controls required.

Use Grip button to move and place level blocks. Use Left Thumbpad/Trigger to Move/Jump. Left Menu button resets character. Triple jumps go higher.
